Subjective: Tired for 2 months; possibly superficial sleep; no clear cause; no acute onset; can still do sports; work going but not enthusiastically; no absenteeism; muscle pain; back pain; morning stiffness; no joint pain; no weight change; no appetite change; no allergies; no respiratory problems; no heart problems; no palpitations; no chest pain.

Assessment: Fatigue of unknown cause; possible anemia; possible thyroid disorder; possible inflammation; rheumatoid arthritis unlikely.
Plan: Blood tests for anemia, thyroid function, and inflammation; results available in 1 day; follow-up phone appointment to discuss results and next steps.
